item.description:
It's it doesn't rain and it's not to hot (what are the chances?) let's play some golf!! Buena Vista is a relatively easy 9-hole course -- great for beginners. From their website ...

Buena Vista is a 9-hole executive style golf course with a country club atmosphere. It features a moderately hilly terrain with strategically placed traps, making it an excellent course for both beginners and average players interested in improving their games.

The par 30 course has a maximum total yardage of 1,832 yards and takes approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours to play. The layout includes a practice green for chipping and putting. Golf clubs and golf carts are available for rental and group lessons are offered.

Buena Vista Golf Course Rates:
9 holes - Weekends & Holidays
$9.25 West Hartford resident w/ I.D.
$12.00 Non-resident

Please check this site the morning of the event for any updates.
item.name: Buena Vista Golf Course - West Hartford
